alert.note: Alert for Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 6:38AM EST until December 19 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... North Fork Black Creek At Middleburg affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 600 AM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Black Creek at Middleburg. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Lazy Acre Road begins to flood. Lowlands flood and boat docks are affected. At 19.0 feet, Water begins to move into homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 2.6 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
